title: Game crash
body: My game keeps crashing after character select and i have used the Hextech repair tool as well and looked for any their party apps on. My router is about a year old so i do not think it is that. It just started after i did this patch can someone help me please.

I suggest going through each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to fix up whatever is causing this to happen.
